title: You kids dont think aliens are real? How uckin stupid do you get?
body:
http://www.onereason.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/universe.jpg

100 **BILLION** stars in one galaxy.

http://scitechdaily.com/images/Scientists-Believe-that-Humans-Will-One-Day-Colonise-the-Universe.jpg

100 **BILLION** galaxies in the observable universe.

That means there are 1,000,000,000,000,000,000 (1 **QUINTILLION** stars) and we are but a single planet rotating around a single star.

It doesn't make any sense that god would make so many more stars just to fill up the universe when we only needed one.

We aren't special.

Life exists elsewhere in the universe.

And aliens are observing us as we speak.

You are all r%%%%%s.
